info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Fremont County through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Royal Gorge, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Royal Gorge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
